name: Deep Dungeon (Smoovifly)
description:
Hello, Everyone This is my very first game that I've made. I hope you like it is not complete. Randomized dungeon where you fight and explore. I will be working on this to make it better if there are any bugs you have found let me know and ill try to fix them for you. 

WASD: is to move 

Space: is to jump

Press E at the door: to move to another Dungeon
